title: Video: Lana Del Rey – Carmen
body:
It’s reached the point where I’m not really sure if I’m in love with **Lana Del Rey**, or merely the idea of her.

Either way, there’s now no denying the impact she’s had on pop music, be it for better or worse. This new video for next single _Carmen_ ditches the _Born To Die_ princess-chic and reverts to **Lana’s** familiar ‘let’s-be-cool-and-use-vintage-looking-clips’ appeal. As you can imagine, it’s crammed with black and white clips of **Grant** chilling with some alternative looking dude, spliced together with retro imagery, awesome… right?

excerpt.full: It’s reached the point where I’m not really sure if I’m in love with Lana Del Rey, or merely the idea of her. Either way, there’s now no denying the impact she’s had on pop music, be it for better or worse. This new video for next single Carmen ditches the Born To Die princess-chic \[…\]
